name: Scud Frenzy
description: Scud Frenzy, the Biggest Game Show in the Cosmos, brings you a fast paced eight-directional shooter about destruction, chaos, rewards and high-scores.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (or Higher) Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
